abstract: Tensions have risen between United States and Nigeria following failed attempt to rescue girls kidnapped by militant Boko Haram, with both countries accusing each other of failure; distrust between countries hindered rescue effort, with Nigeria claiming lack of American support and United States pointing to Nigeria's poor human rights record.
lead_paragraph: Distrust between the two countries has resurfaced as the search for nearly 300 kidnapped girls has lost momentum.
snippet: Distrust between the two countries has resurfaced as the search for nearly 300 kidnapped girls has lost momentum.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: With Schoolgirls Taken by Boko Haram Still Missing, U.S.-Nigeria Ties Falter
headline.print_headline: With Schoolgirls Still Missing, Fragile U.S.-Nigeria Ties Falter
